item.title: Experience
item.description: 2012-Now Obtained scholarship many times National Scholarship for Ph.D National Scholarship for M.S National People’s Scholarship for B.S 2016-Now Participant Many Scientific Researches including nations, company and regions. Algorithm and model design Writing materials and documents Acceptance and defense Coordination and Cooperation 2019-2020 Served as the secretary of SPIE Harbin Chapter and Reviewer of IEEE Organizing acitivities and communicating with other experts Reviewing the science papers Participanting and speeching in conference 2017-2019 Served as a Teaching Assistant for Signals and Systems
